issue.title: Gazebo6 installation failing on Ubuntu 14.04 lts (trusty tahr) running on virtual box

content.raw:
Very good question, I don't know if I can give a satisfying answer:
We are running a computer lab with lots of workstations, about 50:50 32 bit to 64 bit ratio. I was tasked to update to a newer version of gazebo. The test workstation was 32 bit install.
I will definitely now test the install on a 64 bit install but if gazebo6 works for the projects it would be nice to update gazebo on the 32 bit systems too.
content.html: Very good question, I don't know if I can give a satisfying answer: We are running a computer lab with lots of workstations, about 50:50 32 bit to 64 bit ratio. I was tasked to update to a newer version of gazebo. The test workstation was 32 bit install. I will definitely now test the install on a 64 bit install but if gazebo6 works for the projects it would be nice to update gazebo on the 32 bit systems too.
